result.execSummary:
The defendant Richard E Moreno was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. On one or more other charges, Richard E Moreno was found not guilty. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Richard E Moreno is presumed innocent of the not guilty charges.

  • Richard E Moreno was found guilty of 1st Degree Child Sexual Assault - Intercourse with Person under 12, a class B felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.02(1)(b).
  • Richard E Moreno was found guilty of Incest with Child, a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 948.06(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
